test 1 - set atime and mtime to 4/20
atime: 2018-04-20 04:11:11.123456700 -0700
mtime: 2018-04-20 04:11:11.123456700 -0700

test 2 - increment mtime by 1s and 1ns
atime: 2018-04-20 04:11:11.123456700 -0700
mtime: 2018-04-20 04:11:12.123456700 -0700

test 3 - increment atime by 2s and 2ns
atime: 2018-04-20 04:11:13.123456700 -0700
mtime: 2018-04-20 04:11:12.123456700 -0700
